summary: Player home located south of Helgen, near the Cyrodiil border.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5][color=#a4c2f4]* * *[/color] Description [color=#a4c2f4]* * *[/color][/size]

[font=Times New Roman][size=3]Small to medium sized player home located near Southfringe Sanctum on the Cyrodiil border (Image:Map),
that has room for 1-3 followers. 
Key to the house is located in the firewood storage left of the doors.[/size]

[color=#ff7700][size=3][u][b]No DLCs are required[/b][/u][/size][/color][/font]

[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/4171?]Skyrim Special Edition Version[/url][/size]
[size=3][url=https://bethesda.net/en/mods/skyrim/mod-detail/4076859]Xbox Version[/url]﻿
[/size]

[size=5][color=#a4c2f4]* * *[/color] Features [color=#a4c2f4]* * *[/color][/size]

[font=Times New Roman][size=3][b][color=#a4c2f4]° [/color][/b]All crafting, navmeshed, map and horse marker, safe & custom storage, lockable doors,
(when you get inside activate door lock 3 times (don't do it super fast) and it should work fine from there on)[/size]
 
[size=3][b][color=#a4c2f4]° [/color][/b]House ledger that gives you options to change stuff in the house,
[b][color=#ff7700]![/color] [/b]Note: before changing anything [color=#ff7700][b]![/b][/color]
[color=#ff7700][b]![/b][/color] make sure nobody is using that room/furniture and to close doors, turn fire off if you change any of those options [color=#ff7700][b]![/b][/color][/size]

[size=3][b][color=#a4c2f4]° [/color][/b]Secret/armory room to display and store armor and weapons,
(it's not navmeshed, it's secret)
[/size]
[size=3][b][color=#a4c2f4]° [/color][/b]Custom skyrim shield (light) one is in the secret room, under armor storage (shields)
It's based on guard shield, only with better stats, craftable, temperable,
(need steel craft perk)[/size]

[size=3][b][color=#a4c2f4]° [/color][/b]Custom spell called Rejuvenated: Health and stamina increased by 10 for 8h, 5% Frost damage resistance for 4h,
(recive after sitting in the bath for 15 seconds)[/size]

[size=3][b][color=#a4c2f4]° [/color][/b]Animated furniture for the player (eat, drink, read, relax),[/size]

[size=3][b][color=#a4c2f4]° [/color][/b]Auto unequip gear for followers (not player) in the bathroom and beds,
(Beds do not unequip by default, but you can change these options in the house ledger)[/size]

[size=3][color=#a4c2f4]° [/color]All doors auto-close after 10 seconds,[/size]

[size=3][b][color=#a4c2f4]° [/color][/b]Opened windows visible from the outside, also smoke from the chimney is visible if the main firepla[/size][/font][font=Times New Roman][size=3]ce is lit.[/size][/font]



[size=5][color=#a4c2f4]* * *[/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/8785167/?tb=mods&pUp=1]My other mods[/url] [color=#a4c2f4]* * *[/color][/size]
[font=Times New Roman][size=3]

And a highly recommended mod
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53068/?]Rigmor of Bruma[/url]
An EPIC 18 mission Quest/Companion Mod[/size][/font][/center]
author: 1xmiha
